subject: Throttle pedal issue order Amazon order 701-7489352-9264258
description_text:
Hi,

I just received my pedal set and I’m having an issue with the throttle
pedal. It worked fine for about an hour, but then it stopped functioning
correctly.

Now the throttle doesn’t register any input until the pedal is pressed
about 30–40%. I noticed that the small gray spring at the base of the
pedal, which presses on the load cell to provide initial pressure, has
broken. Please see the attached pictures.

Unfortunately, I can’t locate the broken plastic piece that holds
the spring down anymore.

Would it be possible to send me a replacement throttle pedal? The pedal is
currently completely unusable.

I’ve already sent you a message through Amazon, but I’m also contacting you
here to share the pictures.

Thank you for your help!

conversations.body_text: Hi，Vincent Mombleau，       We're very sorry that this part is faulty. We will provide you with a brand-new throttle pedal as a replacement.  ​

That's great, thank you very much.
